get.description: Find product data model by id.

parameters.name: productDataModelId
parameters.description: The id of the product data model.

options.description: Optional key-value pairs with string keys

get.summary: Find product data model by id

get.description: Find all product data models which either belong to the user's organization or are public.

post.description: Creates a new item for the specified model. It uses the product data model of the model.

parameters.name: orgaId
parameters.description: The id of the organization you are a member of.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: The id of the model. A item always belongs to a model.

oneOf.description: Used for text fields, email fields, and other string-based data types
Used for numeric fields like quantities, measurements, or calculations

value.description: The value type depends on the data field type.
